description.value:
Granted with unification.

With a horn atop your brow, magic comes intuitively to you.

You may cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand} and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} as arcane innate spells at will. The target of your @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light} spell must be your own horn.
